summary: Comprehensive testing of KAIF LAKE Consumer Cooperative marketplace completed successfully. All backend APIs (31/31 tests passed) and frontend features working perfectly. Multi-language support (RU/EN/ZH), authentication flows, shareholder dashboard, admin panel, and e2e product interactions all functional.
passed_tests: Backend API: All auth endpoints (register, login, me) with JWT authentication
Backend API: Product CRUD operations with shareholder-only creation restrictions
Backend API: Product categories endpoint returns 10 categories as expected
Backend API: Deal system with 1.5% commission calculation working correctly
Backend API: Favorites add/remove functionality
Backend API: Meeting request system
Backend API: Admin endpoints with proper role-based access control
Frontend: Landing page with hero section, categories, how-it-works sections
Frontend: Multi-language switching (RU/EN/ZH) working across all pages
Frontend: Theme toggle (dark/light) functioning properly
Frontend: Catalog page with search and category filtering
Frontend: Authentication flow with proper redirects to dashboard
Frontend: Shareholder dashboard with stats, product management, deals/meetings tabs
Frontend: Admin panel with user management, product moderation, comprehensive stats
Frontend: Product detail page with buy/exchange/meeting request functionality
Frontend: Deal and meeting dialog interactions working
Integration: Frontend-backend communication seamless
Integration: Commission calculations displayed correctly (1.5% total: 0.9% coop + 0.6% manager)
Integration: Role-based access control (shareholder vs client vs admin roles)
Integration: Product creation from UI successfully creates backend entries
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (31/31 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all major features tested successfully)
